<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page default">39f4666c97651110272ef8971153afbf</macroponent><name>secondary_items/NODE__isHidden</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {any} params.imports
  */
function evaluateProperty({api}) {
	if (api.context.app.record_secondary_values_location !== 'sidebar'
    && api.data.gform && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader
    && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems
    && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems.length)
    return false;
  return true;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-23 06:46:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>0af466ac97651110272ef8971153af0c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>secondary_items/NODE__isHidden</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0af466ac97651110272ef8971153af0c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-23 06:46:08</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
